response.summary: Hardware and software maintenance technician, Systems and Computing Engineer. I worked as a Teacher Assistant at my University for 5 years and I'm currently working as a junior software engineer for a Canadian-based company. I currently use the English language on a daily basis to interact with the client and other team members. I'm passionate about math, technology and problem solving using algorithms; I have experience in teaching. I have the capacity to learn, train, lead, work in teams and under pressure; I am attentive, kind, committed, dynamic and diligent.
response.skills: MuleSoft CloudHub, mule, MuleSoft Anypoint Platform, Java, Angular, Resolución de problemas, Diseño de algoritmos, Docencia, Desarrollo de software, Resolución creativa de problemas, Git

company.name: Prosegur
company.description:
Prosegur is a world leader in the private security industry. Through its five business lines —Prosegur Security, Prosegur Cash, Prosegur Alarms, Cipher and Prosegur AVOS— it offers companies, households and retail businesses a security that they can trust, based on the most advanced solutions in the market. 

With presence on the five continents, Prosegur currently has a team of more than 150,000 employees. The company channels its social action through the Prosegur Foundation that works in four lines of activity: education, inclusion of people with disabilities into the job market, corporate volunteering and the promotion of culture.
